featured.text: Mary is suffering from a stomachache and needs to eat food which is easy to _____.

definition.zh_def: 胃痛，通常是由消化不良、胃炎或其他胃部問題引起的不適感。
definition.en_def: A pain in the stomach, often caused by indigestion, gastritis, or other stomach issues.
definition.example: After eating too much candy, I got a terrible stomachache.
